Enable Extended Flowers Pack.Description: (Recommended) Adds a large variety of 30+ flowers and flowering trees in addition to the essential pack.

Rose Color Explosion.Description: Gives each of the seasonal roses four different colors that can be harvested. (Extra roses are excluded from perfection requirements.)

Enhanced Mixed Flower Seeds.Description: With Item Extensions Framework, adds some Cornucopia flowers to vanilla mixed flower seeds.

Enable Giant Crops on Ginger Island.Description: Allows giant crops to grow on Ginger Island farm, which allows you to get giant rafflesias.

Enable Multicolored Flowers.Description: Allow some flowers to create multiple color varieties, similar to most vanilla flowers. If you change this config option, it will only affect newly planted flowers.

SVE Compat Patch.Description: Retextures and renames both rafflesias from Cornucopia and Stardew Valley Expanded to be more different from each other.
